entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 600 metres in the afternoon.
